roleset.name: to annoy, irritate, chafe
roleset.note: GALL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gall' based on internet usage examples, membershipin VN. VerbNet entry 31.1, comparison with 'vex.' (from gall.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Chafing
example.text: The saddle galled the horse's back.

example.name: ARG
example.text: Brougham-1 was galled *trace*-1 at this conduct
